Name: Beyond the Waves
Description: The Pioneer Association and Lollo Logistics introduced another joint campaign. Go check it out over at the Lollo Logistics Truck.
QuestDesc: The Pioneer Association and Lollo Logistics introduced another joint campaign. Go check it out over at the Lollo Logistics Truck.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Lollo Logistics vehicle with a strange paint job... Now where have I seen it before?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Lollo Logistics vehicle with a strange paint job... Now where have I seen it before?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The loudspeaker on the vehicle is playing an advertisement with funny music.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lollo Logistics Truck
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Take out your Terminalâ€”your trusty wish-granter! Lollo Logistics and the Pioneer Association are here to back your favorite campaign: Beyond the Waves, loaded up with perks and goodies!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Lollo Logistics Truck
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Upload your Adventure Logs to this courier truck, and you'll receive an 'Adventure Package' for the corresponding location filled with surprises!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Lollo Logistics Truck
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Lollo express shipping service gets another upgrade! Tiered discounts are now bigger, better, and stronger than ever across the whole campaign!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Lollo Logistics Truck
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "A friendly reminder: While lovely views and rewards are up for grabs, remember that safety always comes first! Be safe and happy adventuring!"
